meaningMnemonic: Those who <radical>stand</radical> on top of a <radical>village</radical> are <kanji>juvenile</kanji>. Imagine a bunch of young people standing on the roofs of buildings in the village. That's a juvenile thing to do.
readingMnemonic: Mostly, though, the  <kanji>juvenile</kanji>s are standing on tope of village buildings, eating <reading>dou</reading>ghnuts (どう).
